publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2109 Linda Fabiani: Burns Monument in Kilmarnock—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive, in full consultation with East Ayrshire Council, to guarantee the restoration of the Burns Monument in Kay Park, Kilmarnock; expresses deep concern for the firemen who were injured in the fire which destroyed the monument, and calls for an investigation into the failures of East Ayrshire Council in their maintenance and management of this historic monument.
S2M-2109 Burns Monument in Kilmarnock (lodged on 6 December 2004) Michael Matheson*

S2M-2109 Linda Fabiani: Burns Monument in Kilmarnock—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive, in full consultation with East Ayrshire Council, to guarantee the restoration of the Burns Monument in Kay Park, Kilmarnock; expresses deep concern for the firemen who were injured in the fire which destroyed the monument, and calls for an investigation into the failures of East Ayrshire Council in their maintenance and management of this historic monument. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2109 Burns Monument in Kilmarnock (lodged on 6 December 2004) Christine Grahame*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Adam Ingram*

S2M-2109 Burns Monument in Kilmarnock (lodged on 6 December 2004) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Brian Adam*, Richard Lochhead*, Rosie Kane*, Eleanor Scott*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Alex Neil*, Frances Curran*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-2109 Burns Monument in Kilmarnock (lodged on 6 December 2004) Mr Andrew Welsh*, Bruce Crawford*, Jim Mather*, Tricia Marwick*, Carolyn Leckie*, Ms Sandra White*, Robin Harper*
S2M-2109 Burns Monument in Kilmarnock (lodged on 6 December 2004) Chris Ballance*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2109 Burns Monument in Kilmarnock (lodged on 6 December 2004) Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-2109 Burns Monument in Kilmarnock (lodged on 6 December 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
